Html:
Hi,
I do not now if this make sence or not, but I read about MS Office Live Workspace and I like to use it from PHPExcel, i.e. save Excel sheets in the Workspace for colleagues around the world to read.
Today I create and mail Excel sheets, but it would be cool to send them to a workspace for authorized to pick.

IMHO, this makes sense. Will check how to do this.
